title: Eastbound trains from Tanjong Pagar to City Hall moving slower

title_translations.zh-Hans: 从丹戎巴葛到市政府的东行列车速度较慢
title_translations.ms: Kereta api arah timur dari Tanjong Pagar ke City Hall bergerak lebih perlahan
title_translations.ta: Tanjong Pagar முதல் City Hall வரையிலான கிழக்கு நோக்கிய ரயில்கள் மெதுவாக நகர்கின்றன

updates.text: UPDATE:Due to trains moving slower earlier,platforms from Tanah Merah towards City Hall maybe crowded.
UPDATE:Eastbound train service from Tanjong Pagar to City Hall running well again.
Eastbound trains from Tanjong Pagar to City Hall moving slower.
